setMarginStart(int).Description: Sets the relative start margin. Margin values should be positive.

getLayoutDirection().Description: Retuns the layout direction. Can be either @B_android#view#View#LAYOUT_DIRECTION_LTR_E@ or @B_android#view#View#LAYOUT_DIRECTION_RTL_E@.

setMargins(int, int, int, int).Description: Sets the margins, in pixels. A call to @B_android#view#View#requestLayout_E@ needs to be done so that the new margins are taken into account. Left and right margins may be overriden by @B_android#view#View#requestLayout_E@ depending on layout direction. Margin values should be positive.
setMargins(int, int, int, int).FullName: public void setMargins (int left, int top, int right, int bottom)

setMargins(int,int,int,int).Description: Sets the margins, in pixels. A call to @B_android#view#View#requestLayout_E@ needs to be done so that the new margins are taken into account. Left and right margins may be overridden by @B_android#view#View#requestLayout_E@ depending on layout direction. Margin values should be positive.
setMargins(int,int,int,int).FullName: public void setMargins (int left, int top, int right, int bottom)

Parameters: ViewGroup.MarginLayoutParams: The layout params to copy from.
ViewGroup.MarginLayoutParams(android.vie.Description: Copy constructor. Clones the width, height and margin values of the source.

Parameters: int: the direction of the layout @B_android#view#View#LAYOUT_DIRECTION_LTR_E@ @B_android#view#View#LAYOUT_DIRECTION_RTL_E@
resolveLayoutDirection(int).Description: This will be called by @B_android#view#View#requestLayout_E@. Left and Right margins may be overridden depending on layout direction.

Parameters: int: the layout direction. Should be either @B_android#view#View#LAYOUT_DIRECTION_LTR_E@ or @B_android#view#View#LAYOUT_DIRECTION_RTL_E@.

getMarginEnd().Description: Returns the end margin in pixels.

getMarginStart().Description: Returns the start margin in pixels.

Parameters: AttributeSet: the set of attributes from which to extract the layout parameters' values
ViewGroup.MarginLayoutParams(android.con.Description: Creates a new set of layout parameters. The values are extracted from the supplied attributes set and context.

Returns: true if either marginStart or marginEnd has been set.

setMarginEnd(int).Description: Sets the relative end margin. Margin values should be positive.

ClassDesc: Per-child layout information for layouts that support margins. See @B_android#R#styleable#ViewGroup_MarginLayout_E@ for a list of all child view attributes that this class supports.
